item.title: 中国推出永久性农村金融框架，放宽风险监管规则
item.description: 中国将建立常态化财政支持机制，促进乡村振兴，防止返贫，标志着从过渡性扶贫转向长期扶持。【原文：China will establish a permanent financial support framework to promote rural revitalization and prevent a slide back into poverty, marking a shift from transitional aid to long-term support.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称泰国需财政支持与降息提振疲软经济
item.description: 国际货币基金组织表示，泰国需要采取"精心校准"的政策组合来支持放缓的经济，并敦促实施有针对性的财政支持措施，同时进一步放松货币政策。【原文：Thailand needs a “carefully calibrated” mix of policies to support a slowing economy, the International Monetary Fund said, urging targeted fiscal support with additional monetary easing.】

item.title: 菲律宾首家企业斥资13亿美元进军水电业务
item.description: 菲律宾企业周五晚间发表声明称，第一代公司将以750亿比索（约合13亿美元）收购Prime Infrastructure Capital Inc.水电资产组合40%的股权。【原文：First Gen Corp. will buy a 40% stake in Prime Infrastructure Capital Inc.’s hydropower portfolio in a deal worth 75 billion pesos ($1.3 billion), the Philippine companies said in a statement late Friday.】

item.title: 墨西哥国家石油公司重返墨西哥市场发行18亿美元债券
item.description: 墨西哥国家石油公司（Petroleos Mexicanos）发行了315亿比索（约合18亿美元）的债券，结束了其六年未参与本地市场的局面。【原文：Mexican state oil company Petroleos Mexicanos has issued 31.5 billion pesos ($1.8 billion) in debt, ending a six-year absence from local markets.】

item.title: 米达斯汽车维修品牌所有者美维斯轮胎据称正考虑在美国上市
item.description: 据知情人士透露，旗下拥有米达斯（Midas）和塔菲（Tuffy）等品牌的汽车维修与轮胎服务供应商美维斯轮胎快修服务公司（Mavis Tire Express Services Corp.）正考虑在美国首次公开募股。【原文：Mavis Tire Express Services Corp., an auto repair and tire service provider that counts Midas and Tuffy among its brands, is considering a US initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Humana收购Arsenal Capital旗下诊所运营商MaxHealth
item.description: Humana公司已收购MaxHealth，此次交易将把这家佛罗里达州医疗诊所运营商与该保险公司的CenterWell老年初级保健部门整合。【原文：Humana Inc. has acquired MaxHealth in a deal that will combine the Florida operator of health-care clinics with the insurer’s CenterWell Senior Primary Care division.】

item.title: 如何启动一只ETF？至少需要25万美元和一个创意
item.description: 白标公司可以帮助您创建自己的ETF，但需要支付相应费用。【原文：White-label firms can help you build your own ETF, for a price】

item.title: 华尔街逆转周：高信心押注转为毒药
item.description: 华尔街以全押姿态迈入2026年——现金储备创历史新低，对冲操作降至最低，投资信心达到顶峰。六周后，大批共识交易接连失灵。【原文：Wall Street entered 2026 all-in — record-low cash, minimal hedging, maximum conviction. Six weeks later, a slew of consensus trades are misfiring.】

item.title: 广告平台Moloco据称选择高盛、摩根大通作为IPO承销商
item.description: 知情人士透露，广告技术公司Moloco已选定银行为其安排首次公开募股事宜。【原文：Advertising technology company Moloco has selected banks to arrange an initial public offering of the company, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: OpenAI停用争议性4o人工智能模型，引发忠实用户不满
item.description: GPT-4o展现了人们与聊天机器人之间可能形成的独特情感纽带。【原文：GPT-4o showed the unique attachment that people can form with chatbots】

item.title: 美联储官员古尔斯比称，进一步降息取决于通胀是否趋近2%目标
item.description: 芝加哥联邦储备银行行长奥斯坦·古尔斯比表示，若通胀率有望达到2%的目标，美国央行可进一步降息，但当前情况并非如此。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago President Austan Goolsbee said the US central bank can cut interest rates further if inflation is on track to reach its 2% target, but that’s not currently the case.】

item.title: 此刻每个人都该感到焦虑吧
item.description: 痛苦与焦虑无处不在。【原文：There’s pain and anxiety all around.】

item.title: 参议院民主党人要求就美国解除间谍软件制裁作出解释
item.description: 五名美国民主党参议员要求特朗普政府解释其解除制裁的决定——此前政府曾指控这些人员协助传播先进监控技术，据称该技术已被用于监控美国公民。【原文：Five Democratic US senators are asking the Trump administration to explain its decision to lift sanctions on people the government had previously accused of helping spread sophisticated surveillance technology that’s allegedly been used against Americans.】

item.title: 亚马逊支持的核能公司获美国批准生产反应堆燃料
item.description: 由亚马逊公司支持的先进核能企业X-Energy反应堆公司，已获得联邦政府批准为先进反应堆生产铀燃料，这是50多年来颁发的首张此类新许可证。【原文：X-Energy Reactor Co., an advanced nuclear company backed by Amazon.com Inc., received federal approval to make uranium fuel for advanced reactors, the first such new license in more than 50 years.】

item.title: 秘鲁央行行长称该国经济迄今未受选举风险影响
item.description: 秘鲁最大银行之一的首席执行官相当确信，这个采矿大国的经济在2026年仍能延续大宗商品繁荣的势头，基本不受即将举行的全国大选和持续的政治动荡所扰。【原文：The chief executive of one of Peru’s largest banks is reasonably sure that the mining nation’s economy can continue to ride a commodities boom in 2026, largely tuning out the noise of looming general elections and unyielding political turmoil.】

item.title: 城堡投资集团员工薪酬支出拖累53亿美元收益
item.description: 尽管去年投资回报率下滑，肯·格里芬旗下城堡投资集团的员工薪酬仍保持稳定，凸显出在激烈的人才争夺战中运营巨型多策略对冲基金所面临的沉重成本负担。【原文：Employee pay at Ken Griffin’s Citadel held fast last year despite lower returns, underscoring the burdensome costs that come with running giant multistrategy hedge funds amid a heated fight for talent.】

item.title: 世界第二大黄金生产商首席执行官称“愿意推进”并购事宜
item.description: 阿格尼科鹰矿业公司首席执行官阿马尔·阿勒琼迪表示，这家黄金生产商在收购方面"处于非常有利的位置"，一旦出现机会便会积极推进。这表明该公司经过多年专注于现有矿山增产后，如今重新展现出对交易的开放态度。【原文：Agnico Eagle Mines Ltd. Chief Executive Officer Ammar Al-Joundi said the gold producer is “very well-positioned” to pursue acquisitions should opportunities emerge, signaling a renewed openness to deal-making after years focused on growing output from existing mines.】

item.title: First Brands考虑将部分业务单元纳入第7章清算程序
item.description: 知情人士透露，随着现金储备日益紧张，First Brands集团及其部分债权人正考虑将旗下若干业务单元转入《破产法》第七章规定的破产清算程序。【原文：First Brands Group and some of its creditors are weighing a shift of some of its units into the Chapter 7 bankruptcy liquidation process as the company runs low on cash, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据称SpaceX考虑在IPO中采用双重股权结构以增强马斯克权力
item.description: 据知情人士透露，SpaceX正考虑在今年计划中的首次公开募股（IPO）中采用双层股权结构，这与该公司亿万富翁创始人埃隆·马斯克为特斯拉公司提出的策略如出一辙。【原文：SpaceX is considering a dual-class share structure in its planned IPO this year, according to people familiar with the matter, mirroring a strategy its billionaire founder Elon Musk floated for Tesla Inc.】

item.title: 墨西哥拘留水上乐园公司前首席执行官
item.description: 据执法部门称，破产水上乐园运营商海豚公司前负责人已在墨西哥被捕。【原文：The former head of bankrupt aquatic-parks operator The Dolphin Company has been arrested in Mexico, according to law enforcement.】

item.title: 加纳塞地延续2026年疲软态势，企业支付美元账单
item.description: 加纳货币周五对美元汇率小幅走弱，因美元需求上升以支付进口款项。【原文：Ghana’s currency weakened slightly against the dollar on Friday as demand for the greenback rose to pay for imports.】

item.title: OpenAI获选为美国无人机集群挑战赛提供语音控制技术
item.description: 据多位知情人士透露，OpenAI已与两家国防科技公司达成合作，这两家公司被五角大楼选中，将竞相为美军开发语音控制的无人机群集软件。【原文：OpenAI has partnered with two defense technology companies that the Pentagon has selected to compete to develop voice-controlled, drone swarming software for the US military, according to multiple people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 电子游戏需要更便宜才能买得起
item.description: 摆脱电子游戏行业低迷状态的一种方法是认识到：玩家不会为大多数游戏花费70美元。【原文：One way to get out of the video-game industry funk is to recognize that players aren’t spending $70 on most games】

item.title: 人工智能担忧拖累呼叫中心运营商6亿美元债券发售
item.description: 美国企业Concentrix Corp.本周为债务再融资支付了高昂代价，该公司为其他企业提供外包客户服务和呼叫中心运营服务，因市场担忧人工智能将冲击其业务而陷入困境。【原文：Concentrix Corp., a US firm that provides outsourced customer service and call-center operations for other companies, paid a hefty price this week to refinance debt amid fears that artificial intelligence will undermine its business.】

item.title: 人工智能引发的担忧加剧市场波动，导致其多年来推动的股市出现下跌。
item.description: 三年间，人工智能曾是股市的救星。如今它却突然化身掠夺者，股市几乎每个角落都难逃其冲击。【原文：For three years, AI was the stock market’s savior. Suddenly, it’s become a marauder, and virtually no corner of the equity market looks safe from its impact.】

item.title: 美国支持对俄罗斯钯进口征收133%的初步关税
item.description: 美国商务部初步支持某矿商关于对俄罗斯钯进口征收反倾销税的请愿——税率高达近133%——最终决定将于今年晚些时候作出。【原文：The US Commerce Department issued preliminary support for a miner’s petition to impose anti-dumping duties on imports of Russian palladium — with a rate of almost 133% — ahead of a final decision later this year.】

item.title: 金融科技公司Figure开始营销原生区块链股票
item.description: 图灵科技解决方案公司已正式向投资者推出423万股所谓区块链原生股票，这家金融科技企业正加入革新股票交易基础设施的竞赛。【原文：Figure Technology Solutions Inc. has started to formally market 4.23 million shares of its so-called blockchain-native stock to investors, as the financial technology firm joins the race to revolutionize share trading infrastructure.】

item.title: 迪拜任命可信赖高管保护DP世界核心资产
item.description: 随着迪拜环球港务集团首席执行官苏尔坦·艾哈迈德·本·苏莱姆与失势金融家杰弗里·爱泼斯坦的关联被曝光，迪拜最珍视的资产之一陷入危机。两家国际投资基金接连与这家物流巨头切断联系。【原文：As DP World Ltd. Chief Executive Officer Sultan Ahmed bin Sulayem’s alleged links to disgraced financier Jeffrey Epstein emerged, one of Dubai’s most prized assets was under siege. In quick succession, two international investment funds curbed ties with the logistics giant.】

item.title: 弗拉维奥·博索纳罗错失向巴西投资者展示实力的机会，其正寻求竞选总统
item.description: 巴西参议员弗拉维奥·博索纳罗作为今年总统大选的主要右翼候选人浮出水面，却未能在他所争取的投资者群体中留下强有力的第一印象。【原文：Brazil Senator Flavio Bolsonaro failed to make a strong first impression among the very investors he is courting as he emerges as the main right-wing contender in this year’s presidential vote.】

item.title: 克利夫兰-克利夫斯公司首席执行官通过信托完成3700万美元股票出售
item.description: 据该公司发言人透露，首席执行官洛伦索·贡萨尔维斯出售克利夫兰克利夫斯公司价值3730万美元的股票，是通过为家族遗产规划设立的信托基金完成的。【原文：A $37.3 million sale of Cleveland-Cliffs Inc. shares by Chief Executive Officer Lourenco Goncalves was done through a trust set up for family estate planning, according to a company spokesperson.】
